body:
Hey guys,
I know some of you guys play basketball so I want to know some things so we can compare.

PPG (Points per game) - We don't have a stat board but I would say maybe like 8 points per game, which for my team is good.

Team W/L ratio - I think we went 5 for 32 or something

What position are you? - I'm Point guard and shooting guard.

For fun have you had any ankle breakers? - I did :P and I even made the shot right after and I have it on video but It has some personal things so...

title: The Basketball Thread

replies.body: I'm the shortest kid in my grade so I'm not gonna play bball
replies.body_tagged: I'm the shortest kid in my grade so I'm not gonna play bball

replies.body: one time i touched a basketball and someone said haha you touched balls so i didn't again
replies.body_tagged: one time i touched a basketball and someone said haha you touched balls so i didn't again

replies.body:
PPG - 5 points on average
W/L - We play in seasons (winter + summer) and so the teams can switch up. With my current team we're going 9 wins to 3 losses, and every loss have been without a full squad.
Position - Point guard and sweeper (team made-up role) where I receive the rebounds from the tall, and then penetrate the ball movement past their defense

I don't really have shooting skills so I am responsible for setting up plays; I have the most assists.

replies.body:
I play basketball as a hobby. I really love it. It has helped me grow a few cm during the summer.
I had ankle breakers as well :P
